connect20/latest_twitter_feeds.name: connect20/Latest_Twitter_Feeds

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/latest_twitter_feeds.description: Latest Twitter Feeds Extension is Powered with new oAuth API 1.1. and it will show your latest twitter feeds in your website sidebar as well as on any CMS page of your choice.
